dcterms:creator: J. Gao
C. Sun
Z. Yang
R. Nevatia
dcterms:description: Charades-STA is a widely used dataset for temporal video grounding, originally collected from the Charades dataset. It contains 6,672 videos with 16,128 video-query pairs, composed of 12,408 training pairs and 3,720 testing pairs. Each video is about 29.76 seconds long and has an average of 2.4 annotated moments.
dcterms:title: Charades-STA

dcterms:creator: R. Krishna
K. Hata
F. Ren
L. Fei-Fei
J. Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: ActivityNet Captions is a widely used dataset for dense video captioning, providing query annotations that can be used for temporal video grounding. It contains 20,000 videos related to 200 activity classes with 100,000 queries, with each video having an average length of about 120 seconds.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet Captions
